translated: The Buddha Speaks the SÅ«tra of the Divine Talismans of the Seven Thousand Buddhas
Extending the lifespan of a human body and increasing one's life span. At the age of one hundred and twenty years, Jiachen...
... increasing one's life span. The seven thousand buddhas protect the human body, causing one not to see evil...
... save me and increase my life span.
The seven thousand buddhas protect the human body and sever all... Jiazi.
From the Buddha, those who increase their life span and whose lives end...
... the seven thousand buddhas descend and increase my life span.ğŸ”½The seven thousand buddhas rescue and protect those...
... increasing their food and life span. The seven hundred and seventy buddhas descend.
And increase my life span.
The seven hundred and seventy buddhas descend and protect the body.
For those with illnesses, the bodhisattva destroys the demons.
The thirty-five buddhas descend.
And increase my life span.
The seven hundred and seventy buddhas protect the human body.
Causing it to become strong, courageous, and diligently practicing. The fifty-three buddhas descend.
And increase my life span.
For hundreds of millions of years, they will always attain Buddhahood.
Six Buddhas have descended and been born.
They have increased my lifespan.
Seven hundred and seventy Buddhas have protected people's lives and increased their bodies.
They have opened up wisdom and enabled one to penetrate through without obstruction.
Seven Buddhas have descended and been born, increasing my lifespan.
Thirty-five Buddhas have guided people's bodies.
Their demeanor is flawless.
The myriad demons are naturally afraid.
Eighty thousand Bodhisattvas have increased my lifespan.
Seventy-three Buddhas, the Buddhas of Vows, and all the Bodhisattvas, as well as those seeking to become Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas,

These Arhats have increased my lifespan as disciples.ğŸ”½The talismans of seven thousand Buddhas strike and subdue the myriad demons, witchcraft, mountain forests, altars, and the northern gods, all of which naturally disappear.ğŸ”½The talismans of a thousand Buddhas strike and subdue the myriad demons, the Wind King, the Stove Lord, the Water Dragon Gods, and the Earth Lords, all of which naturally disappear.
The talismans of a thousand Buddhas strike and subdue the five grains, the six qi, bad dreams, crying, wild paths, and curses, all of which naturally disappear.
The star lord of Pojun destroys emptiness.
The star lord of Wugui is in charge of official matters.ğŸ”½The star lord of Lianzhen is in charge of verbal disputes.
The star lord of Wenqu is in charge of bad dreams.
The star lord of Luå­˜ is in charge of a hundred ghosts.
The star lord of Jumen is in charge of non-corpse.
The star lord of Tanlang is in charge of evil qi.
The stars in the Northern Dipper are in charge of life.
The stars in the Northern Dipper are in charge of a hundred ghosts.
The stars of the Three Terraces are in charge of protecting life.
The first is the star of resentment, the second is the star of goodness,
The third is the star of avoidance, the fourth is the star of Mars,
The fifth is the star of Wei, which can eliminate disasters and accept difficulties.
It wards off epidemic qi and illnesses from all under Heaven.
It investigates evil and non-human beings.
Evil ghosts all leave a thousand miles away.
Urgent, like the law.
The first is the talisman for opening the mind.
The second is the talisman for increasing calculations.
The third is the talisman for saving and protecting one's life.
The fourth is the talisman for the mutual non-containment of metal, wood, water, fire, and earth.
The fifth note is for the birth of a human, the death of a ghost, and the depletion of the divine talisman.
All evil things that are born will be destroyed upon seeing the talisman.
Scatter and destroy, quickly, as if by imperial decree.
The general is in the son.

On the 20th day of the 6th month, the first day of the white period, the 9th day of the 10th month, the 10th day of the 11th month, the 12th day of the 12th month, the 1st day of the 1st month, the 2nd day of the 2nd month, the 3rd day of the 3rd month, the 4th day of the 4th month, the 5th day of the 5th month, the 6th day of the 6th month, the 7th day of the 7th month, the 8th day of the 8th month, the 9th day of the 9th month, the 10th day of the 10th month, the 11th day of the 11th month, the 12th day of the 12th month, the 13th day of the 1st month, the 14th day of the 2nd month, the 15th day of the 3rd month, the 16th day of the 4th month, the 17th day of the 5th month, the 18th day of the 6th month, the 19th day of the 7th month, the 20th day of the 8th month, the 21st day of the 9th month, the 22nd day of the 10th month, the 23rd day of the 11th month, the 24th day of the 12th month, the 25th day of the 1st month, the 26th day of the 2nd month, the 27th day of the 3rd month, the 28th day of the 4th month, the 29th day of the 5th month, the 30th day of the 6th month,
The Bodhisattvas protect me.
Six hundred sets of armor cover me.
The Five Emperors assist me.
The five kinds of music accompany me.
The five cavalrymen guard me.
The stars align with me.
The five silks depend on me.
The five fragrances perfume me.ğŸ”½A golden bed lies me down.
A brocade quilt covers me.
Sages support me.
Jade maidens attend me.ğŸ”½Blue dragons lead me.
White tigers guard me.
The officials of the Duke of Zhou accept me.
The five surnames respect me.
The myriad surnames honor me.
Elders comply with me.
Villages favor me.
Bows, arrows, swords, and weapons, as well as thieves, stay away from me.
Tigers, wolves, and venomous snakes avoid me.
The five poisons and evil spells avoid my body.
After wearing the talisman, the heavens open up the four directions.
Hundreds of ghosts do not follow.
Falling into water does not drown me.
Swords and weapons do not injure me.
Coming and going are auspicious.
Not encountering misfortune or calamity.
The generals of the Five Peaks in the four directions protect me.
Without the Way, all is incomplete.
May the talisman protect me in front.
May the wise respect me.
May good medicine be given to me.
May the divine talisman protect me.
May the hundreds of ghosts avoid me.
May the hundreds of spirits love me.ğŸ”½May the heavenly gate open for me.
May the earthly door release me.
May cool springs drink me.
May wind, frost, and rain remove obstacles from the Way.ğŸ”½Those who go against the talisman will perish.
Those who go against the talisman will die.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts of misfortune and misfortune, the new and old notes, the male and female ghosts.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts of the mountains, forests, and altars.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts that roam the heavens.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts with red tongues.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts of the five soils in the houses.ğŸ”½The talisman suppresses the ghosts that roam the earth's energy during the day.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts that die from stars.ğŸ”½The talisman suppresses the ghosts that die as guests.
The talisman suppresses the ghosts that die in battles and prisons.
After the disciple wears the talisman of the thousand Buddhas,
When going out in the four directions,ğŸ”½There will be a thousand paths without end,
And ten thousand paths without difficulty.
One will not have bad dreams while sleeping.
One will always obtain what one seeks.
One's wishes will be fulfilled.
The Dharma of the Thousand Buddhas is like a talisman.
What is ordered is urgent, like a decree.

The first is the talisman for opening the mind, the second is the talisman for increasing blessings, the third is the talisman for saving one's life, the fourth is the talisman for the five elements not harming each other, the fifth is the talisman for the ghosts of the dead and the wasting of vitality, the sixth is the talisman for the ghosts of death and misfortune, the seventh is the talisman for the ghosts of the three periods, the eighth is the talisman for the ghosts that roam the heavens, the ninth is the talisman for the ghosts with red tongues, the tenth is the talisman for the ghosts of the five soils, the eleventh is the talisman for the ghosts that roam the earth during the day, the twelfth is the talisman for the ghosts that die from the stars, the thirteenth is the talisman for the ghosts that die as guests, the fourteenth is the talisman for the ghosts that die in battle or in prison, the fifteenth is the talisman for the ghosts of misfortune to women, the sixteenth is the talisman for the ghosts of the innocent.
